title: New Project Wizard Doesn't Remember Last Location
description: In the New Project Wizard, when I deselect 'Use default' and manually enter a location like '/test', and then reselect 'Use default' (even if I accidentally click the checkbox label), the 'Directory' field becomes empty. I believe Eclipse should remember the last location, at least while the dialog is shown.
OB: When deselecting 'Use default' and manually entering a location like '/test' and then reselecting 'Use default' (even if clicking the checkbox label), the 'Directory' field becomes empty.
EB: I expect that Eclipse should remember the last entered location in the 'Directory' field, at least while the New Project Wizard dialog is still open.
SR:
1. Open the New Project Wizard.
2. Deselect 'Use default'.
3. Manually enter a location, for example, '/test'.
4. Reselect 'Use default' (even if you accidentally click the checkbox label).
5. Deselect 'Use default' again.
6. Observe that the 'Directory' field is empty. It should have retained the last entered location.
